validEmailComDomain

public void validEmailComDomain()
                         throws TRAPException
Check that an email in the com domain is accepted. There aren't supposed to be any checks on the domain but this is just a check. This isn't a valid address but the format is correct.

Throws:
TRAPException - When form submission fails

validEmailEduDomain

                         throws TRAPException
